Macros
HWA_COMPRESS_MODE
HWA Driver External Data Structures » HWA_MACROS

Macros that define values for the selecting either the compression or the decompression mode of CMP_DCMP_Engine. More...

Macros

#define HWA_CMP_DCMP_COMPRESS   ((uint8_t)0U)
 
#define HWA_CMP_DCMP_DECOMPRESS   ((uint8_t)1U)
 

Detailed Description

Macros that define values for the selecting either the compression or the decompression mode of CMP_DCMP_Engine.

Value Mode
0 Compression
1 Decompression

Macro Definition Documentation

#define HWA_CMP_DCMP_COMPRESS   ((uint8_t)0U)

Compression mode.

#define HWA_CMP_DCMP_DECOMPRESS   ((uint8_t)1U)

Decompression mode.
